me anuwa welenda hingaya 2017 wasare di wartha wu. e. ja. dolar biliyana 9.6ka sita 2018 wasare di e. ja. dolar biliyana 10.3k dakwa yam ihala yamak wartha kaleya. 2018 wasare desambar masaye di sancharaka ipayim pera wasare anurupa kalaparichchedayata sapekshawa siyayata 4.8ka wardhanayak wartha karamin shakthimath mattamaka pawathi athara, ema nisa 2018 wasare mulu sancharaka ipayim e. ja. dolar biliyana 4.4k dakwa 2017 wasarata sapekshawa siyayata 11.6 kin wardhanaya wiya. 2018 wasare desambar masaye di widesha sewa niyukthikayange preshana siyayata 13.0 kin pahala yamath samanga 2018 wasare di. e. ja. dolar biliyana 7.0k dakwa siyayata 2.1ka sulu aduwimak wartha kaleya.

masa 2 1/2 k athulatha niwese idikirim awasan wiya.jathika niwasa sanwardhana adhikariye saha rajya samagamak wana ooshan wiw aayathanaye mulya dayakathwayen ha meheyawimen me niwesa idikara thibu athara ee sandaha shrama dayakathwaya laba di thibune shri lanka yuda hamudawa wisini.rupiyal miliyana 02 ka watinakamakin yuthu me anga sampurna niwesa upamali rathnakumari kridikawata bhara dima wenuwen pasugiya 01 wanida dambaulla, bulagala di uthsawayak da sanwidhanaya kota thibini.eda bulagala gamwasin kageth sathuta dore gala thibini.gamata yana adi para konkrit parak bawata pathwiya.widuliya nathi pawul 30 kata widuliya labuni.upamalige niwasa aya sathu wu dinaye di gamwasinge sathutata eewa da hethu wiya.“upamali rathnakumari kridikawa ran padakkamak gena emin shri lankawata kirthiya gena aawa.thrasthawadaya mulumaninma parajayata path karamin wathman janadhipathithuma apata laba dun ran padakkama apa katath amathaka karanna baha.ratata jayagrahana gena dena, kirthiya gena dena pudgalayan raka ganima owunta shakthimath wima mulu ratema wagakimak.ee nisayi api siyalu bheda pasekala janadhipathithuman athulu ranawiruwan jathyanthara aparadha adhikaranayata gena yame wayama paradiya yuththe.”
ee ape amarayage hati hitan.
mehidi shri lankawata erehiwa karunu idiripath kirima sandaha des wides rajya nowana kriyakarin 10 kata adhika pirisak manawa himikam komisame shalawa wenkara gena thibe.
swarna pusthaka samikshaka mandalaye palamu wataye samikshakayan wisin nosalaka harinu labime wedanawa ohuta pamanak nowa ohu niyojanaya karana kulakayema hada parannak wiya.

ee anuwa merata pudgalayan kotiyak pamana mema wadasatahanata dayaka weyi.‘diwi nanguma’ prathama piyawara yatathe masa 7 k athulatha pawul laksha 15 ka gruha aarthikaya ihala nanwimata awasthawa labunu bawath ilakkaya wuye gruha aarthika eekaka laksha 10 k athi kirima bawath basil rajapaksha amathiwaraya pawasiya.pasugiya masa 7 athulatha diwi nanguma yatathe pol pala 3612773 situwa athi bawath kukulu patawun lakshayakata adhika gananak beda hara athi bawath dhiwara wyapruthi 26242 k pamana kriyathmaka kara athi bawath aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye athireka lekam (sanwardhana) aar.ee.ee. ranawaka mahatha pawasayi.me athara diwi nagumen labunu elawalu aswanna nisa 2011 pebarawari masaye sita pasugiya sapthambar masaya dakwa wu kalayedi elawalu mila siyayata 35 sita siyayata 70 dakwa adu wi athi bawath ranawaka mahatha pawasiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
